languages.text: "Не знаю и не хочу знать. Эти искалеченные люди, эти странные стекла, разговоры про "Зарю"... Слишком явные признаки безумия и ереси. Я бы хотел понять, как человек, которого я знал, дошел до такого, но... не стоит смотреть в бездну".

"I do not know nor do I want to know. These ravaged people, this strange glass, all this talk of 'Aurora'... These are abundantly clear signs of lunacy and heresy. I wish I could understand how the man I knew came to be this way, but... one should not peer into the abyss."
languages.original_text: "Не знаю и не хочу знать. Эти искалеченные люди, эти странные стекла, разговоры про "Зарю"... Слишком явные признаки безумия и ереси. Я бы хотел понять, как человек, которого я знал, дошел до такого, но... не стоит смотреть в бездну".

traits.locale_text: "I do not know nor do I want to know. These ravaged people, this strange glass, these talks of 'Aurora'... These are abundantly clear signs of lunacy and heresy. I wish I could understand how the man I knew came to be this way, but... one should not look into the abyss."

"I do not know nor do I want to know. These ravaged people, this strange glass, these talks of 'Aurora'... These are abundantly clear signs of lunacy and heresy. I wish I could understand how the man I knew came to be this way, but... one should not look into the abyss."

"I do not know nor do I want to know. These ravaged people, this strange glass, all this talk of 'Aurora'... These are abundantly clear signs of lunacy and heresy. I wish I could understand how the man I knew came to be this way, but... one should not peer into the abyss."

"I do not know nor do I want to know. These ravaged people, this strange glass, all this talk of 'Aurora'... These are abundantly clear signs of lunacy and heresy. I wish I could understand how the man I knew came to be this way, but... one should not peer into the abyss."

"I do not know nor do I want to know. These ravaged people, this strange glass, all this talk of 'Aurora'... These are abundantly clear signs of lunacy and heresy. I wish I could understand how the man I knew came to be this way, but... one should not peer into the abyss."

languages.text: “我不知道，也不想知道。这些遭到蹂躏的人，这古怪的玻璃，还有所有关于‘极光’的谈话……这一切都带着非常明显的疯狂与异端迹象。我希望我能弄清楚，我曾认识的那个人怎么会变成这个样子，可……人不应该窥视深渊。”
languages.original_text: "I do not know nor do I want to know. These ravaged people, this strange glass, all this talk of 'Aurora'... These are abundantly clear signs of lunacy and heresy. I wish I could understand how the man I knew came to be this way, but... one should not peer into the abyss."

traits.locale_text: “我不知道，也不想知道。这些遭到蹂躏的人，这古怪的玻璃，还有所有关于‘极光’的谈话……这一切都带着非常明显的疯狂与异端迹象。我希望我能弄清楚，我曾认识的那个人怎么会变成这个样子，可……人不应该窥视深渊。”

languages.text: 「俺は知らないし、知りたいとも思わない。この疲弊した者たち、奇妙なガラス、そして『オーロラ』に関する話…これらは明らかに狂気と異端の兆候だ。俺がよく知る男がどうしてこんな風になったのか理解できればいいのだが…人は深淵を覗いてはならぬものだ」
languages.original_text: "I do not know nor do I want to know. These ravaged people, this strange glass, all this talk of 'Aurora'... These are abundantly clear signs of lunacy and heresy. I wish I could understand how the man I knew came to be this way, but... one should not peer into the abyss."

traits.locale_text: 「私は知らないし、知りたくもありません。この荒涼とした人々、奇妙なガラス、そして「オーロラ」の話…これらは狂気と異端を示す明白な兆候です。私が知っている男がなぜこのようなことになったのか理解できない。だが….人は深淵を覗いてはならないのです」
「俺は知らないし、知りたいとも思わない。この疲弊した者たち、奇妙なガラス、そして『オーロラ』に関する話…これらは明らかに狂気と異端の兆候だ。俺がよく知る男がどうしてこんな風になったのか理解できればいいのだが…人は深淵を覗いてはならぬものだ」

languages.text: "Ich weiß es nicht und will es auch nicht wissen. Die malträtierten Menschen, dieses seltsame Glas, das ganze Gerede von 'Aurora' ... Das sind unmissverständliche Anzeichen von Wahnsinn und Ketzerei. Ich wünschte, ich verstünde, wie der Mann, den ich kannte, so wurde, aber ... niemand sollte in den Abgrund blicken."
languages.original_text: "I do not know nor do I want to know. These ravaged people, this strange glass, all this talk of 'Aurora'... These are abundantly clear signs of lunacy and heresy. I wish I could understand how the man I knew came to be this way, but... one should not peer into the abyss."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß es nicht und will es auch nicht wissen. Die malträtierten Menschen, dieses seltsame Glas, das ganze Gerede von 'Aurora' ... Das sind unmissverständliche Anzeichen von Wahnsinn und Ketzerei. Ich wünschte, ich verstünde, wie der Mann, den ich kannte, so wurde, aber ... niemand sollte in den Abgrund blicken."

languages.text: « Je l'ignore et je ne veux pas le savoir. Ces gens martyrisés, ce verre étrange, et toutes ces histoires à propos de cette "Aurore"... Autant de signes manifestes de démence et d'hérésie. J'aimerais pouvoir comprendre comment l'homme que j'ai connu en est arrivé là, mais... nul ne devrait plonger son regard dans l'abîme. »
languages.original_text: "I do not know nor do I want to know. These ravaged people, this strange glass, all this talk of 'Aurora'... These are abundantly clear signs of lunacy and heresy. I wish I could understand how the man I knew came to be this way, but... one should not peer into the abyss."

traits.locale_text: « Je l'ignore et je ne veux pas le savoir. Ces gens martyrisés, ce verre étrange, et toutes ces histoires à propos de cette "Aurore"... Autant de signes manifestes de démence et d'hérésie. J'aimerais pouvoir comprendre comment l'homme que j'ai connu en est arrivé là, mais... nul ne devrait plonger son regard dans l'abîme. »

languages.text: «No lo sé y no quiero saberlo. Esta gente maltrecha, este extraño vidrio, toda esta palabrería de la "Aurora"... Son todo muestras de demencia y de herejía. Me gustaría saber cómo alguien a quien conocía ha acabado así, pero... es mejor no mirar al abismo».
languages.original_text: "I do not know nor do I want to know. These ravaged people, this strange glass, all this talk of 'Aurora'... These are abundantly clear signs of lunacy and heresy. I wish I could understand how the man I knew came to be this way, but... one should not peer into the abyss."

traits.locale_text: «No lo sé y no quiero saberlo. Esta gente maltrecha, este extraño vidrio, toda esta palabrería de la "Aurora"... Son todo muestras de demencia y de herejía. Me gustaría saber cómo alguien a quien conocía ha acabado así, pero... es mejor no mirar al abismo».

languages.text: "Bilmiyorum, bilmek de istemiyorum. Bu harap olmuş insanlar, bu garip cam, tüm bu 'Aurora' lakırdıları... Bunlar apaçık delilik ve kâfirlik işaretleri. Keşke dostumun bu hâle nasıl geldiğini anlayabilseydim ama... Uçuruma çok bakmamak lazım gelir."
languages.original_text: "I do not know nor do I want to know. These ravaged people, this strange glass, all this talk of 'Aurora'... These are abundantly clear signs of lunacy and heresy. I wish I could understand how the man I knew came to be this way, but... one should not peer into the abyss."

traits.locale_text: "Bilmiyorum, bilmek de istemiyorum. Bu harap olmuş insanlar, bu garip cam, tüm bu 'Aurora' lakırdıları... Bunlar apaçık delilik ve kâfirlik işaretleri. Keşke dostumun bu hâle nasıl geldiğini anlayabilseydim ama... Uçuruma çok bakmamak lazım gelir."
